steps.title: Basic Controls
steps.description: Master the essential controls: WASD for **driving**, mouse for **camera**, and left click for **nitro boost**. Use spacebar for **handbrake** and shift for **super speed**.

steps.title: Truck Selection
steps.description: Choose your **monster truck** based on your playstyle. **Light offroaders** are fast but less stable, **heavy trucks** are slow but powerful, and **balanced rigs** offer versatile performance.

steps.title: Driving Mechanics
steps.description: Learn to **drift around corners**, manage your **nitro**, and use **terrain for jumps and stunts**. Remember to repair your **truck** if it gets damaged.

steps.title: Race Strategy
steps.description: Coordinate with your **team**, assign roles, and develop tactics for **offroad races**. Communication is key to victory in **multiplayer events**.

steps.title: Resource Management
steps.description: Manage your resources wisely. Collect **nitro refills** and **repair kits** from supply points, and use your **boost power** strategically.
